question: Domains of WCE Hackathon'18
answer: Rather than giving problem statements which students haven't faced, we will be keeping domains. Participants are free to chose any problem under that domain and submit the abstract.

question: Business Guidance
answer: India has a great requirement of Job Givers than Job Takers. Engineering students have great knowledge of developing a product but not to commercialise. So, we are having mentoring sessions which will guide you to start your own company.

question: Incubation
answer: Samruddhi TBI Foundation would be incubating top teams to realize their ideas into commercialized products.
